pr_title: Remove the hidden tab set from the panes list

timeline.bodyText: It will be very easy for this to break silently if the panes array length changes in the future (which of course it could). Maybe we should just continue through the loop for this tabset?
timeline.author: jmcphers

replies.bodyText: Good plan, I've amended the commit with the change.
replies.author: melissa-barca

timeline.message: revert change so hidden tab set doesn't get added to panes_
revert change so hidden tab set doesn't get added to panes_
